<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Normally an aggregate (array, vector, or structure) is emitted as a u8&#91;&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, if either element/field of the aggregate is a non-NULL address,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emitted as u32&#91;&#93; or u64&#91;&#93;. In the case of unaligned addresses, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aggregate is emitted as u8&#91;&#93;, and the mask() operator is used for all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We first layout the aggregate in &#39;buffer&#39; in bytes, except for those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbol addresses. For the i-th symbol address in the aggregate, its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponding 4-byte or 8-byte elements in &#39;buffer&#39; are filled with 0s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbolPosInBuffer&#91;i-1&#93; records its position in &#39;buffer&#39;, and Symbols&#91;i-1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// records the Value&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
